column1: 'How did you hear about the ESN Buddy Programme?'
'Would you like to receive an email once the Buddy & Integration committee organises an activity for buddies?'
'Can we use your email address for asking your help when we need more volunteers for ESN programmes and/or events? (no spam)'

column2: you agree that we share the following personal information with your buddy: your full name
column3: your email address and your phone number.'

column1: 'I will send an email to bic@esn-groningen.nl in time when I want to cancel my registration.'
